summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correctness of the array copy-to operation under a variety of conditions, including broadcasting, data‑type conversion, execution on multiple GPUs, handling of non‑contiguous memory layouts, conditional copying with masks, and copying scalar values.
business_intent: Ensure that the GPU‑accelerated array library reliably reproduces NumPy copy semantics across diverse scenarios, providing confidence in data movement operations for scientific and engineering applications that rely on accurate and efficient GPU computation.
